name: Inserm Transfert
memberOrga: Inserm Transfert is the private subsidiary of the National Institut of Health and Medical research (INSERM)  http://www.inserm.fr/inserm-transfert
goal: Private subsidiary of Inserm, Inserm Transfert manages every aspect of the promotion and transfer of knowledge obtained by Insermâ€™s research laboratories to industry, thereby helping to promote health innovation. Inserm Transfert focus on adding value and minimizing risk for innovative projects at pre-industrial stage, bridging discovery and clinical research. We put emphasis on identifying high-potential projects, implementing appropriate proof of concept and IP strategies, and setting up win-win/mutually beneficial industrial partnerships.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
- EU initiatives pertaining to pharmaceutical policy, Research and innovation policy, health policy (both human and animal)
- H2020, IMI2 programs, ERC
- Joint action: Health and wellbeing
